What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?
AS we know that the country(India) we are living in is a developing country.India alongwith other developing country can play a major role in reviving the global Economic condition by investing in other countries in form of industrialisation.As we know that the economic condition has detoriated in the last few months due to the crisis in the world market.Inflation has taken its toll on common man there is a requirement that top most industrialist of different developing nation takes a call over reviving the current global economic condition.America been a developed country must assign this task to the  third world countries most likely the developing country to take up the task.Even the world bank can get money invested by the developing countries providing them high rate of return in form interest which will compel the other nation's interest to invest their fund in the world bank and that will help to improve the economic condition.Due to the global economic condition there is a huge hike in the cost of petroleum products and the standard of living has become difficult there is immense requirement for the developing country to play a vital role to save the down fall of global economic condition.
